Title: Color of Night & Playing God + D.O.A. - Triple Feature

reviewText: There is no problem with the DVD's condition or the content of the movies on them but the "Color of Night" DVD was flopping around loose in the container and could have been damaged. Thankfully it was not, and I am sure it would have been very rapidly replaced had it been, but that does not erase the fact that it was not properly affixed inside the package from the start. Such minor mishaps cause loss for everyone in one way or another.I am just happy that this time it was only a star in a rating and I will continue to be a customer.
Title: Color of Night & Playing God + D.O.A. - Triple Feature

reviewText: Unusual stories in each one........Not for watching if you're down or depressed.......lol  In my opinion, guys would like these more than gals.........
summary: Different movies than what I expected.............
Title: Color of Night & Playing God + D.O.A. - Triple Feature

reviewText: All three were good movies, but of course my reason for buying it was Color of Night ! The price was very reasonable and the quality was new !
Title: Color of Night & Playing God + D.O.A. - Triple Feature

reviewText: Playing God is a good movie a7 out of 10.The other two are  also good.Best thing is they are new to me.  The cost is a great deal (4$).  RECEIVED IN A FEW DAYS.
Title: Color of Night & Playing God + D.O.A. - Triple Feature
